Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-40049 affecting package kernel for versions less than 6.6.112.1-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-40049 affecting package kernel for versions less than 6.6.112.1-2. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package kernel is earlier than 6.6.112.1-2, affected by CVE-2025-40049
